issues.title: Higher Education Reform
issues.description: Strongly advocates for reducing federal involvement in higher education, supports reducing student loan programs and federal regulations on colleges

issues.title: Oppose Affordable Care Act
issues.description: Consistently votes to repeal or significantly reduce the Affordable Care Act, supports market-based healthcare solutions

issues.title: Restrictive Immigration Policy
issues.description: Supports strict border control, opposes comprehensive immigration reform, advocates for enhanced border security

issues.title: Fiscal Conservatism
issues.description: Supports significant government spending cuts, opposes tax increases, promotes balanced budget approaches

issues.title: Second Amendment Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of gun ownership rights, opposes gun control legislation, advocates for minimal firearm restrictions

issues.title: Pro-Life Stance
issues.description: Consistently votes against abortion rights, supports restrictions on reproductive healthcare, advocates for pro-life legislation

issues.title: Climate Change Skepticism
issues.description: Opposes extensive environmental regulations, skeptical of climate change scientific consensus, supports fossil fuel industries

issues.title: Limited Government
issues.description: Advocates for reducing federal regulatory power, supports state-level decision-making, opposes expanded federal programs
